description:
For every demand to vaccinate for the sake of “herd immunity” there is a wail from a mother that experienced the death of her child or a v*x injury that now has changed the trajectory of her child’s life. Just because the media doesn’t want to put a spotlight on the opposite side of their funded agenda, it doesn’t mean v*x injuries and death do not exist.

In fact, the lack of coverage over the reality some mothers live through due to a v*x causes those mothers to rally together and lash out, making them appear loud and possibly obnoxious to those who do not understand their agony. It’s not misinformation or lack of knowledge in the women you hear when they cry out, it’s raw pain and real tragedy.

Mothers do not scream out of hurt or shout out of anger without a reason.

Mothers do not create uproar without purpose.

Mothers do not plead out of desperation without pain from experience.

Just because the life they are courageously walking through is invisible to others, doesn’t mean it doesn’t exist. It doesn’t mean their experience isn’t real. It doesn’t mean their child matters less than any other child.

Listen to mothers. Their cries are not fueled by profit. Their cries are fueled by pain.

All children matter. All mothers matter. On both sides. So, let’s meet here in the middle and quit creating chaos long enough to realize this movement is much more complex than fully surrendering to one perspective.

We are facing another crossroads today, but the opportunity you have, in this very moment, is to write your own story, from this day forward.

#believemothers
